remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引發時按一下的資料列的 [更新] 按鈕，但尚未控制項更新資料列。The event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the row. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消更新作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式新增委派給事件的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control.
